extends java.lang.Object
    Author:

      • testGaussianBlurWriteToFile

        public static void testGaussianBlurWriteToFile(java.lang.String inputImageFile,
                                               java.lang.String outputFile,
                                               double sigmaX,
                                               double sigmaY,
                                               double sigmaZ)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Validates Gaussian blur
        Parameters:
        inputImageFile - Path to the source file for the input image
        outputFile - output image file where to save the modified image after contrast operation.
        sigmaX - standard deviation of the Gaussian on the x coordinate
        sigmaY - standard deviation of the Gaussian on the y coordinate
        sigmaZ - standard deviation of the Gaussian on the z coordinate
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        BlurFactory.getGaussianBlur(double, double, double)
